title: Masteries offer very little meaningful diversity.
body:
Bashing on masteries hard now, because I really wanna see new ones for S6.

Your choices right now, as you well know:

Offensive masteries if you want to deal significant damage.
100% of carries use them.
75% of top laners use them.
Every other jungler uses them.

Defensive masteries if you want to live through early cheese or if you don't want to matter come mid-lategame.
Utility masteries if you're support/jungle.

The Offense page is used by everyone yet adds 0 depth or new factors to the game; you just do more damage. Either the other two branches need to matter lategame or masteries should be reworked entirely. 

TL;DR 21+ in Offense matters more than anything else right now. It doesn't add depth or diversity to the game yet it's strictly better on most champions. Masteries deserve a rework.
